message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $75 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $82.50.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product.
I'm close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'd like to squeeze out a bit more value. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $81.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts to accommodate my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $80 for the product.
